title: Am I A God? - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Brainwashing   Business Management   Carefree Protagonist   Cheats   Cold Protagonist   Game Elements   God Protagonist   Hypnotism   Lazy Protagonist   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Money Grubber   Multiple Identities   Pets   Racism   Secret Organizations   Spatial Manipulation   Special Abilities   Sudden Strength Gain   Time Manipulation   Transformation Ability   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Bear Wolfdog   熊狼狗
description:
'Let go of that kitty cat!”

A shooting star whizzed across the sky, causing countless of super powers to appear on Earth. However, the main characters that awaken during this phenomenon aren’t humans, but cats…

During this event, this same thought appeared in the minds of countless cats: “Am I a god?” 
Zhao Yao, an ordinary human, is the only person that can control these super-cats. Zhao Yao: “Am I a god?”>
